alert.note: Alert for Northampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Northampton County through 900 PM EDT... At 814 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cheriton to 9 miles northeast of Grand View. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Cape Charles, Cheriton and Bay View around 820 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Simpkins, Capeville, Townsend, Kiptopeke State Park, Oyster, Eastville, Cheapside, Kiptopeke, Plantation and Dalbys. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
